Uses of Class
entity.Entity

Packages that use Entity
Package
Description
entity
 
manager
 

  • Uses of Entity in entity

    Subclasses of Entity in entity
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DecorEntity
    The DecorEntity class represents a non-living decorative entity in the game.
    class 
    ItemEntity
    The ItemEntity class represents a non-living entity that contains an item.
    class 
    LivingEntity
    The LivingEntity class represents a living entity in the game with various attributes such as health, armor, strength, and magic.
    class 
    Monster
    The Monster class represents a monster entity in the game, which is a type of LivingEntity.
    class 
    NonLivingEntity
    The NonLivingEntity class represents a non-living entity in the game.
    class 
    NPC
    The NPC class represents a non-player character (NPC) in the game.
    class 
    Player
    The Player class represents a player character in the game.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    EntityManager.getDirectionEntity(LivingEntity entity, Direction direction)
    Gets the entity in the specified direction from a given entity.

    Gets an entity at a specified location.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    EntityManager.getEntities()
    Gets all entities managed by the entity manager.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void

    Adds an entity to the entity manager at its current location.
